### Will lectures be recorded?

No. Lectures are not recorded. If you miss class, get notes from a classmate and come to office hours with questions.

## Grading

### How do I request a regrade?

Submit a regrade request through [Gradescope](https://www.gradescope.com/courses/1208698) within 7 days of receiving your grade. Explain specifically why you believe the grading was incorrect. Note that your entire submission may be regraded, which could result in a higher or lower score.

## Still have questions?
If your question isn't answered here, post on [Ed Discussion](https://edstem.org/us/courses/90602/discussion). You'll get a faster response there than by email, and your classmates may benefit from the answer too.
